Description: Module IOM1: Module not availableParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: The module IOM1 was not detectedwhen the operating mode ProfileVelocity or Profile Torque withreference value via analog input wasactivated.The module IOM1 has been removedwhen the de device was off.

Description: Module IOM1: Module IOM1 requiredfor velocity or torque limitation viaanalog inputParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Velocity or torque limitation viaanalog input has been activated, butthe module IOM1 has not beeninserted.
Correctives: Insert the module IOM1 or deactivatethe velocity or torque limitationsetting via the analog input.

Description: Module IOM1: Overload or shortcircuit at analog outputParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Overload or shot circuit at one of theanalog outputs.

Description: Module IOM1: Module IOM1 notsupported in combination withPROFINET fieldbus moduleParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: The module IOM1 is not supported ifthe PROFINET fieldbus module isused.
